items.content_html: Micro-Savings Collector Manager is a lightweight web application designed to help traditional savings collectors (also known as susu collectors) manage their daily operations more efficiently.
items.title: DennyEngineer/susunet: Micro-Savings Collector Manager is a lightweight web application designed to help traditional savings collectors (also known as susu collectors) manage their daily operations more efficiently.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.
items.title: AymenSakouhi/proFile: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.

items.content_html: A minimal GraphQL API built with .NET that provides simple CRUD operations for managing games. This project serves as a lightweight example of how to use GraphQL to query, add, update, and delete game entries, making it ideal for learning and experimentation.
items.title: omarrwafiick/Nodejs_Qraphql_GamesApi: A minimal GraphQL API built with .NET that provides simple CRUD operations for managing games. This project serves as a lightweight example of how to use GraphQL to query, add, update, and delete game entries, making it ideal for learning and experimentation.

items.content_html: JavaScript lightbox gallery for images, video, audio, iframes, html. Zoomable, responsive, accessible, lightweight.
items.title: henrygd/bigger-picture: JavaScript lightbox gallery for images, video, audio, iframes, html. Zoomable, responsive, accessible, lightweight.

items.content_html: StepRunner is a lightweight tool for manually executing Gherkin-based feature files step-by-step. Ideal for exploratory testing, documentation walkthroughs, or scenarios not ready for automation.
items.title: steveswinsburg/steprunner: StepRunner is a lightweight tool for manually executing Gherkin-based feature files step-by-step. Ideal for exploratory testing, documentation walkthroughs, or scenarios not ready for automation.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight, web-based iPerf3 GUI built with Python 3 and Flask. Run speed tests from any device — macOS, Linux, Windows, or mobile.

items.content_html: prom-analytics-proxy is a lightweight proxy that captures detailed analytics on PromQL queries, providing valuable insights into query usage and performance.
